input.sentences: i just love labor day and how everyone in town are so patriotic .
i always look forward to the big labor day parade .
looks like everyone has a seat for this parade .
here comes the mayor waving at the crowd .
even the fire dept . has to show off their shiny new fire truck .
output.sentences: The porch was decorated for the holiday with flags.
People started lining the streets to get ready for the parade.
The parade started and the mayor drove by waving to the crowds.
The firetruck in the parade looked great!
